name: Avoid using Java Activities (TIBCO BW)
description:
This rule searches for ProcessActivities of type Java Activities.
ProcessActivity is a property captured in the metamodel.
output:
This report lists all  Processe Activities of type Java Activity.
It provides the following information:
Process Activity full name.
The associated value is the activityType.
rationale:
The use of Java activities is discouraged since it will break the BusinessWorks design.
It is possible to use Java code from external classes instead or to use the Java Custom Functions to extend XPaths possibilities of BusinessWorks.
